main event: A witness in Fairborn, Ohio observed a star-like object that appeared to hover for about 5 minutes before suddenly disappearing behind a tree.
interesting points: The object was white in color and about half the size of a basketball.
The object stopped and hovered for about 1 minute, then immediately began moving again.
The object accelerated to a high speed and disappeared.
Several aircraft were in the area around the time of the sighting, including a B-52 that was making low-level runs prior to landing.
The witness estimated the object could have been covered by the full width of a match held at arm's length.
